p:
All experiments were simulated for 10,000 years to achieve steady-state solutions of major biogeochemical tracers. Unless clearly defined otherwise, all experiments were run under preindustrial conditions, Mk3L
mild , driven by monthly climatologies of surface conditions over an annual cycle. Surface climatologies required to force the OGCM and OBGCM under Mk3L
mild conditions were generated by a 10,000 year pre-industrial (PI) control run of the flux corrected CSIRO Mk3L v1.2 climate system model in fully coupled mode
62 .
